library(maps)

#GDP, School Gender Ratio, and Fertility by Country
data = read.csv("~/Desktop/MasterGapminder.csv")

map("world")

  as_tibble

  geom_map(aes(fill = TotalFert2015), map = world) +
  expand_limits(x = world$long, y = world$lat)

  expand_limits(x = world$long, y = world$lat)
